server

Interface IShutdownHandler

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IProtocolHandler
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    SampleProtocolHandler

    public interface IShutdownHandler
extends IProtocolHandler
    If you want to be told when a client exits, make sure your ProtocolHandler implements IShutdownHandler instead of IProtocolHandler.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void logout(ClientState state)
      When client terminates connection, this method is invoked, but only if the ProtocolHandler also implements IShutdownHandler.

      • Methods inherited from interface server.IProtocolHandler

        process

    • Method Detail

      • logout

        void logout(ClientState state)
        When client terminates connection, this method is invoked, but only if the ProtocolHandler also implements IShutdownHandler.

        Parameter is the state of the thread being terminated.
